text: Human tonsils were obtained from tonsillectomy samples of hypertrophic and obstructive tonsils without a current infection .
Ethical permission was obtained from Cantonal Ethics Commission , and informed consent was obtained from patients .

Paraformaldehyde-fixed tonsil cryosections were stained with unconjugated rabbit IgG polyclonal antibody to human <extra_id_0> RUNX1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Santa Cruz Biotechnology , Inc . ) or unconjugated mouse IgG1 mAb to human <extra_id_0> RUNX3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Abcam ) .
After a washing step , the sections were stained with the corresponding secondary antibodies .

<extra_id_0> RUNX1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - binding antibodies were detected by using Alexa Fluor 633-conjugated goat anti-rabbit IgG and <extra_id_0> RUNX3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - binding antibodies were detected by using Alexa Fluor 532-conjugated goat anti-mouse IgG1 .
event: <extra_id_0> <extra_id_0> Binding binding <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Theme RUNX1 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Binding binding <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Theme RUNX3 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1>

text: Afterward , the sections were washed and in the case of <extra_id_0> RUNX3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> staining a blocking step with an unconjugated mouse IgG1 mAb was used .
Finally , the sections were stained with Alexa Fluor 488-conjugated mouse IgG1 mAb to human <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( eBioscience ) or the corresponding isotype control .
Tissue sections were stained with DAPI for the demonstration of nuclei and mounted with Prolong antifade ( Invitrogen ) .
Images were acquired and analyzed using the confocal microscope DMI 4000B and the TCS SPE system ( both from Leica ) .
